title: Swipe left for Google App Discover Feed not working in Android 10?
content:
After updating to Android 10, the swipe left feature to have Google App with the "Discover Feed" open from my home screen randomly stops working.
I need to go to Home App Settings and switch the "Display Google App" off and back on to fix the issue. 
This didn't happen in Android Pie, started after Android 10 update. 
#Pixel2XL #Android10
